title: #382:  UFOs, Project Blue Beam, the New World Order, Occult Magick and the Antichrist with Isaac Weishaupt
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome the Illuminati Watcher Isaac Weishaupt to the show to discuss the recent UFO disclosure and how it relates to the world of the Occult. This is an instant classic so I hope you enjoy. Thank you for your support!

See me do stand up:
Cleveland: Oct 23rd: Hilarities 9:30pm show
www.pickwickandfrolic.com/2020/06/sam_tripoli/

https://philadelphia.heliumcomedy.com/events/40847
